Special Powers
THE MUTANT C.I.A.: Stealth. Improved Movement: Hindering. Improved Targeting: Hindering.
NEURO-RESPONSIVE WAR MITTEN ...IT'S NOT A "BRANCH": FREE: Choose one power or ability to use this turn: Blades/Claws/Fangs, Precision Strike, Giant Reach: 2.

Comments
January 17, 2021
tyroclix
WIN/LOSS: 3-2 25 point Neena is a cheap little limited PC piece with a chance to make an attack. Mutant CIA is what makes her useful. Not pushable, she can harass and support a little until she is off her top click - then she can X-Men back or help others as you see fit. EDIT 2022: New rules breathes a little more value into our girl. She can be a bit more aggressive without pushing damage but improved movement hindering doesn't exist. Hate the sculpt but dig her enough for when I need 25 points.
January 4, 2021
eelnoside
This character has the X-Men Team Ability.
